message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk to start.
Alice, that's not fair at all. I'm proposing a more balanced split that reflects the value I bring to the table.  We can do better than this.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I still need a majority. It's a fair split that reflects our contributions.
Alice, the value of the money is decreasing rapidly. We need to settle this now.  My offer is more than fair considering the time pressure.
